short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will let you see the entire text of the (usually long) PSE Project and Milestone names

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save time and avoid the frustration of selecting which project or milestones when submitting your timesheet. PSE Project/Milestone Expander Plugin allows you to set how wide you want the Project and Milestone fields and expands it automatically for you.
